lead_paragraph: The avian flu virus was confirmed for the first time in Nebraska, at an egg-laying farm housing 1.7 million chickens, the Agriculture Department said.

headline.print_headline: Avian Flu Virus Confirmed in Nebraska
headline.main: Avian Flu Virus Confirmed in Nebraska

snippet: The avian flu virus was confirmed for the first time in Nebraska, at an egg-laying farm housing 1.7 million chickens, the Agriculture Department said.
abstract: Agriculture Department confirms first case of fast-spreading avian flu virus in Nebraska, at commercial egg-laying farm; case brings number of states affected by outbreak to 16, and tally of birds who have died or will be killed to 32 million.
